## FoundationLayout class

Top level web component which is used to initialise a custom layout

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FoundationLayout extends FASTElement implements LayoutComponent 
```
<b>Extends:</b> FASTElement

<b>Implements:</b> LayoutComponent

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [reloadBuffer](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.reloadbuffer.md) |  | number | Number describing how long to wait in ms before reloading the config when adding items decleratively by the html API. Default 500 (ms). |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addItem(config, placement)](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.additem.md) |  | Dynamically add a new item to the layout. The user can move the new plane to whenever they want once it has been added. |
|  [getLayout()](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.getlayout.md) |  | Gets a minified string containing the config describing the current layout of the layout object to later restore in [function](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.loadlayout.md) |
|  [getRegisteredNames(layout)](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.getregisterednames.md) | <code>static</code> | Gets all of the required registration function names for a set of config |
|  [loadLayout(layout)](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.loadlayout.md) |  | Restores a layout described in the config from [getLayout()](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.getlayout.md) |
|  [registerItem(config)](./foundation-layout.foundationlayout.registeritem.md) |  | Register an item with the layout system for later use |
